channel.title: government on MillMint
channel.description: Recent content in government on MillMint

item.title: Commonwealth Parliament
item.description: ߷ The Vekllei Interior Parliament is a commownealth-level political body of the Government of Vekllei The Commonwealth Parliament is the supranational governing body of the Vekllei Commonwealth and its member-states. Secretariats of the Commonwealth Parliament ⚒️Commonwealth Construction Secretariat (coming soon) 🏵Commonwealth Culture Secretariat 🎓Commonwealth Education Secretariat ⚕️Commonwealth Health Secretariat (coming soon) ⛓️Commonwealth Labour Secretariat (coming soon) 🏹Commonwealth Security Secretariat

item.title: Crown Parliament
item.description: ߷ The Vekllei Crown Parliament is a supranational-level political body of the Government of Vekllei The Commonwealth Parliament is the supranational governing body of the Vekllei Commonwealth and its member-states. Secretariats of the Commonwealth Parliament ⚖️Courts of the Crown (coming soon) 💼Fair Work Authority (coming soon) 🗳️Vekllei Democracy Commissariat (coming soon)

item.title: Interior Parliament
item.description: ߷ The Vekllei Interior Parliament is a national-level political body of the Government of Vekllei The Vekllei Interior Parliaments are national political chambers of members of the Commonwealth. The ministries below belong to the Vekllei Islands Parliament, but most other full members of the Commonwealth maintain identical government structure. Ministries of the Interior Parliament 🪙Ministry of Commerce 🌐Ministry of the Commonwealth ⚔️Ministry of Defence 🌍Ministry of Foreign Affairs (coming soon) ⚙️Ministry of Industry (coming soon) 🚧Ministry of Infrastructure (coming soon) 🌋Ministry of Landscape (coming soon) 🔌Ministry of Light & Water ⛏️Ministry of Syndicates & Chapels (coming soon) 🚃Ministry of Transport (coming soon)
